agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Criminal Justice TIME & DATE: 12:00 PM or upon adjournment Thursday, May 2, 2019 PLACE: Senator Whitmire's Desk CHAIR: Senator John Whitmire SB 550 West | et al. Relating to the eligibility of certain criminal defendants for an order of nondisclosure of criminal history record information. SB 1637 Zaffirini Relating to the administrative, civil, and criminal consequences, including fines, fees, and costs, imposed on persons arrested for, charged with, or convicted of certain criminal offenses. SB 2093 Hughes Relating to subpoenas, orders, and warrants for the disclosure of location information, electronic customer communications records, and electronic customer data and for the use of pen registers, ESN readers, cell site simulators, and mobile tracking devices; creating a criminal offense.
